summary.description:
A general framework for integrating heterogeneous single-cell modalities.

Schema is a general algorithm for integrating heterogeneous data modalities, with application to multi-modal single-cell biological datasets, and is described in the paper “Schema: A general framework for integrating heterogeneous single-cell modalities” by Rohit Singh, Ashwin Narayan, Brian Hie, and Bonnie Berger.

||| COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/hapi (CSAIL.MIT.EDU), bio.tools/isobase (CSAIL.MIT.EDU), bio.tools/struct2net (CSAIL.MIT.EDU), bio.tools/partifold (CSAIL.MIT.EDU).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'schema_learn'
summary.name: SCHEMA
